hero.description:
A tech stack to deliver effective and efficient solutions for your business.
Using the latest technologies and best practices.
hero.contact: Contact us to plan your next project!
hero.title: We build <1>websites and webapps</1> for you and your business

subject: Subject
draft:
I would like to make an appointment between DATE and DATE, can you do that?

Kind regards,
NAME

tech-stack.react: We use React for our webapp projects. React allows us to easily build fast and responsive web applications. It is often combined with NextJS for server side rendering and a hefty performance boost.
tech-stack.next: We use NextJS for our website and webapp projects. NextJS uses strategies like server side rendering, static generation and code splitting to provide a fast and performant experience.
tech-stack.vue: We use VueJS for our webapp projects. We see it as a great alternative to React. VueJS is often combined with NuxtJS for server side rendering.
tech-stack.laravel: We use laravel for our backend and fullstack projects. Laravel allows us to easily build APIs and web applications with PHP.

nawijzer.description: NaWijzer.nl is a website I build for my first client: Adequaat, Groningen. The website presents a political questionnaire to the users. The website also has a webapp behind the scenes that allows admins to generate reports as well as create new questions and answer sets.
nawijzer.caption-2: Admin dashboard with dark mode support
